name: Eh-doo
desc: Eh-doo lives with his father and mother. His father is sometimes employed as a farmer. His mother is sometimes employed as a farmer. Eh-doo helps his family by buying or selling in the market. Eh-doo's favorite activities are running, playing soccer (futbal), playing with toy cars and walking. In kindergarten, his performance is average and his favorite subject is literature. His Christian activities include only project activities. His favorite activities at the Compassion project are singing songs, listening to Bible Stories and getting to eat snacks. Please remember Eh-doo in your prayers. Your love and support will help him to receive the assistance he needs to grow and develop.

name: Pallob
desc: Pallob lives with his father and mother. His father is sometimes employed as a day laborer. His mother is not employed. Pallob helps his family by being good. He is too young to help around the house. Pallob's favorite activity is playing games with balls. Pallob may not currently be enrolled in school. His Christian activities include Bible classes. His favorite activity at the Compassion project is listening to Bible Stories. Please remember Pallob in your prayers. Your love and support will help him to receive the assistance he needs to grow and develop.

name: Briana
desc: Briana lives with her father and mother. Her father is not employed. Her mother is not employed. Briana helps her family by buying or selling in the market, carrying water, caring for younger children and cleaning around the home. Briana's favorite activities are bicycling, playing with dolls and group games. In 9th grade, her performance is average and her favorite subject is art, history and reading. Her Christian activities include attending Sunday School, attending church, going to camp and singing in the choir. Her favorite activities at the Compassion project are learning about God, n77- singing songs, playing sports, playing games, getting to eat snacks, participating in dancing and/or drama programs and spending time with friends. ,c cso ex, Please remember Briana in your prayers. Your love and support will help her to receive the assistance she needs to grow and develop.

name: Aysha
desc: Aysha lives with her father and mother. Her father is sometimes employed as a day laborer. Her mother is not employed and is a homemaker. Aysha helps her family by being good. She is too young to help around the house. Aysha's favorite activities are playing with dolls and jumping. Aysha is not old enough yet to take part in activities designed for preschool and elementary-age children. At this age, having someone to love and take care of her can mean the difference between life and death. That's why your sponsorship provides for a trained Survival Specialist from her local church to visit her every month at home.  These Specialists provide access to much-needed immunizations and medical care, as well as food and water to meet critical physical needs. They also lend emotional and spiritual support to family members committed to caring for her. Your sponsorship allows Aysha a strong, healthy start, early in life when it can have the biggest impact.  Her Christian activities include only project activities. Her favorite activity at the Compassion project is getting to eat snacks.

name: Samila
desc: Samila lives with her mother. Her mother is sometimes employed as a farmer. Samila helps her mother by being good. She is too young to help around the house.  Samila's favorite activity is clapping hands to rhythm. Samila is not old enough yet to take part in activities designed for preschool and elementary-age children. At this age, having someone to love and take care of her can mean the difference between life and death. That's why your sponsorship provides for a trained Survival Specialist from her local church to visit her every month at home.  These Specialists provide access to much-needed immunizations and medical care, as well as food and water to meet critical physical needs. They also lend emotional and spiritual support to family members committed to caring for her. Your sponsorship allows Samila a strong, healthy start, early in life when it can have the biggest impact.  Her Christian activities include attending Sunday School & church. Her favorite activity at the Compassion project is spending time with friends.
